data.name: DeepDark ANSI: Green
data.description: Dark theme for animesub.info forum and wish list. Best looking with native theme "Zielona". DeepDark ANSI comes with 6 color variations: Blacklight, Blue, Green, Orange, Red and Turquoise.

user.name: kostek00
user.about: If you see something missing or incorrect on page that I wrote style for write me mail with title "[Stylish] style name here". I will try to fix it as soon as I read your mail.

data.name: brick-hill metro dark theme
data.description:
a "flat" and dark theme for brick-hill.
changes almost everything to black, even the scroll bar.

known issues:
 - username font color is black on forums

if you find any problem with this theme please message me on brick-hill:
https://www.brick-hill.com/user/484/

data.name: TVN24 -  Dark, flat
data.description:
A dark, flat, simple yet readable style for tvn24.pl website.
Uses grey-brown + yellow composition.

It should work sort of OK on other related sites such as eurosport.tvn24 or TVN Warszawa although the main target of this style is the basic TVN24.pl page, so some things might not look as good as they probably could.
data.css:
@-moz-document domain("tvn24bis.pl"), domain("tvn24.pl"), domain("www.tvn24.pl"), domain("www.tvn24bis.pl") {
body,
.mainContainer,
.headerTop,
.headerShareContainer.sticky,
.searchFormHeader .search,
.main-container,
.main-container .content-wrapper,
.section-header,
.header-network,
.stock-wrapper .content-wrapper,
.sidebar-column,
.sidebar-column .magazine .magazine-wrapper,
#navigation-main,
.nav-fixed .stock-exchange,
.main-playlist > footer,
.main-playlist > footer .bx-wrapper .bx-controls-direction a.disabled,
.main-playlist > footer article,
.search-form input.search,
#navigation-main .social > li,
.topic .excerpt-wrapper,
.page-topic .sidebar-column .live-article,
.newsList,
#mainPage,
.weatherInfoBox1,
.standardContainer,
.quickLinks,
#footerLinks,
#portals,
.mainVideoContainer .playlistModule,
.commentsInfo .textSize li,
.shareContainerTop,
#header,
#mainMenu,
#footer .logotypes,
#footer,
nav,
.bgBlue_v4,
.bgGrey_v1,
.forumComment.newForumComment .bgContainer,
.subForumComment .commentHolder .textContainer,
.headerBgGrey,
.forumComment.newForumComment .commentHolder .textContainer,
#homepage-playlist .homepage-playlist-header,
#homepage-playlist .main-playlist .playlist-content .playlist-title,
#report-bar,
.page-weekend .sidebar-column .live-article,
.bodyAdvert,
.advert,
.forumList.case,
.avatar,
.forumList .quoteForum,
.note,
.module .bg-wrapper,
.moduleMain-Standard .stripe,
.inner-article,
.section-title,
aside,
h1,
div.select,
select,
footer,
.full-copyright,
.btn-wrapper,
.btn-wrapper a,
.main-driver-widget,
.module-emission,
.list-wrapper,
.btn-show-more,
.main-gallery-thumbs,
.commentsList li,
.opinion,
.newsTabBox h1,
.exchangeRate h1,
.moduleVideo h1,
.weatherBox h1,
.weatherLongTerm,
.htmlBox h1,
#forum .sorting .select,
h3,
p,
.blogBox .blog,
section,
.EmbeddedTweet,
.dropdown,
td,
.article-content,
.col340.column,
#submenu,
#menu,
#bodyWrapper,
#headerWrapper
{
    background: #353535 !important;
    border-color: #a62 !important;
    text-shadow: none !important;
}

body,
article,
p,
.lead,
.col-1 h1 a,
.col-2 h1 a,
.col-3 h1 a,
.col-4 h1 a,
.black,
.col-4 h2 a,
.searchFormHeader .search,
.detail > header h1,
.related-news h1,
.page-category .value,
.page-detail .value,
.search-form input.search,
h1 a,
h2 a,
.playlistModule .playlist .frame .film .item .title,
.newsItem .contentFromCMS .standardParagraph.leadMargin .lead strong,
.standardParagraph,
.standardParagraph p,
#forum .forumComment.newForumComment.notLoggedIn .textContainer,
#indexTabs .tab .rate,
.graph .smallitem .table .row div,
.moduleMain-Standard .stripe.yellow a,
select,
.article-detail__content,
.article-content,
.photo-figure__caption,
.share-container
{
    color: #ccc !important;
}

*
{
    color: #ccc !important;
}

a,
a:active,
a:visited,
a:hover,
h1:hover,
.col-1 h1 a:hover,
.col-2 h1 a:hover,
.col-3 h1 a:hover,
.col-4 h1 a:hover,
.section-header h1,
.related-news ul li a,
.standardHeader2,
.searchLocalWeatherBox label,
.weatherInfoBox1 .forecast .noLink,
.newsList .standardHeader1 a,
.materialsList li a,
.standardParagraph h2,
#rights ul li.cookies a,
#mainMenu ul li .submenu li.active a,
#footer .footerLink ul li a,
.forumComment .commentHolder .author,
.module-information li a,
.graph .table-header p a.more,
.related-articles li a,
#report-bar .item a,
.weekend-item .module.type-article .bg-wrapper .content h2,
.single-article .single-article__lead
{
    text-decoration: none !important;
    text-shadow: none !important;
    color: #79d079 !important;
}

.textShadowWhite_bottomRight,
.innerArticleModule h2 a,
.innerArticleModule h1 a
{
    color: #79d079 !important;
    text-shadow: #1f1f1f 1px 1px 0;
    text-shadow: none !important;
}

.selectWeatherBox .newListSelected .selectedTxt,
.weatherInfoBox1 .addLocalization,
.weatherInfoBox1 a.forecastLink,
.readMore,
.newsList .standardHeader1 a:hover,
.date60m,
.quickLinks li a,
.articleDescription:hover,
.articleDescription,
#footerLinks ul li a,
#mainMenu ul li .submenu li a,
nav #menu li a,
.articleDetailHolder h1,
a:hover,
a.more span,
.newsTabBox .sublink-container a span,
.newsTabBox ul li.hourAgo time,
.editorialWithPhoto h1,
.detal .heading h1,
.main-six-elements header > h1 a,
.main-six-elements header > h1 span,
.main-single-element .section-title a,
.main-single-element .section-title span,
y,
h1,
h2,
h3
{
    color: #c59d25 !important;
}

.playlistModule .playlist .frame .film .item.active,
.btn-wrapper a
{
    border: 3px solid #c59d25 !important;
}

.mainContainer,
.borderGrey,
.forumComment .commentHolder .textContainer,
.newsTabBox .content
{
    border: none !important;
}

.editorialWithPhoto a :hover,
p.title,
.header-network .network-links .active.ms-hover a,
.editorialWithPhoto .subtitle,
.editorialWithPhoto h1
{
    text-decoration: none !important;
    color: black !important;
    text-shadow: none !important;
}

.faktyTVNOnline
{
    position: relative !important;
}

.article-lead,
.article__content,
.article-story-content__elements,
.article-story-content__elements-container,
.article-element--subhead h2,
.article-story-content,
.article-stories-list-container,
.article
{
    background-color: #353535;
}

.report__container,
.report-article,
.report-article div,
.report-article__lead::before
{
    background: #353535 !important;
}

h1.heading
{
    padding-top: 10px;
    padding-left: 10px !important;
}

.header__sublogo.header-sublogo,
.heading,
.top-story__header,
.stories-list-article-content__read-more-link,
.header__list-item,
.header__logo,
.hamburger .hamburger__button,
.header-menu-items,
.header-menu__more-list,
.publication-tvn24 .news-of-the-day__item,
.nav__container,
.nav__back-button
{
    background-color: #1c1c1c !important;
    padding-left: 10px;
}

.article-labels-row aside
{
    background-color: #fba118 !important;
}

.narrow-column-external-content__lead
{
    padding-top: 15px;
    background-color: #4d4d4d;
}

.designation-name
{
    color: #4d4d4d !important;
}

.news-of-the-day__item,
.narrow-column-related__articles,
.caption,
.playlist__thumbnails
{
    background-color: #353535 !important;
}

.publication-tvn24 .news-of-the-day__item:after
{
    background: none !important;
}

.news-of-the-day__list
{
    border: none !important;
}

.article-top-bar
{
    background-color: #353535;
    border: none;
}

.narrow-column-related__article-title
{
    background-color: #353535 !important;
    color: #ccc;
}

.article-top-bar__general-inf,
.article-main-asset__meta,
.news-of-the-day__item
{
    color: #ccc;
    border: none !important;
}

.heading--size-24
{
    background: none !important;
}

.publication-tvn24 .playlist__thumbnails,
.publication-tvn24 .caption--playlist
{
    background: none !important;
}

.article-label,
.article-label--updated span
{
    color: #4d4d4d !important;
}

.top-story__label,
.article-label.article-label--created,
.article-label.article-label--created div
{
    background-color: #eea41d !important;
    color: #4d4d4d !important;
    border: none;
}

.top-widgets .prepare-for__inner,
.news-of-the-day__item
{
    background-color: #353535 !important;
}
}

data.name: ROBLOX Cartoon Landscape Theme
data.description: This is also on my desktop. I decided to make it public on stylish for people to take it too, Enjoy!
